author: Tucker Reals
title: Coronavirus updates: Progress, but the COVID-19 "beast is still alive"
description: In some of the hardest-hit nations and America's own virus ground-zero, unprecedented shutdowns are turning the tide, but in some places, patience is wearing thin.
content: The Trump administration on Monday announced it is extending a sweeping public health order that border officials have been using to expel thousands of unauthorized migrants and asylum-seekers who the government says could spread the coronavirus if allowed in… [+2011 chars]
